description:
Retro styling and the kind of cozy that never gets old, this toasty Aviator hat is ready meet winter head on.

  • Warm outer layer blends polyester and ethically sourced wool
  • Soft Sherpa fleece lining holds in the heat
  • Gentle Velcro chin strap keeps the hat right where it should be
  • One size fits all design
name: Kombi The Hip Aviator Hat - Children to Youths
